snippet.title: Tiny Thief - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Sneaky preview & gameplay footage from the game Tiny Thief, to be launched on summer 2013 for Mobile, Tablets, PC & Mac. Created by Barcelona based 5 Ants Studio and published by Rovio Entertainment.

Solve 30 puzzles along 5 distinct chapters and steal over 85 hidden items in this unique mind-boggling adventure!

Stay tuned for more news about the upcoming gameplay trailer!

Follow up on Twitter @5ants
www.5Ants.com
